attributes.action: Put a stop to advertising gambling sites and offers
attributes.additional_details: I for one have been dealing with a gambling addiction and I'm doing well but it's shoved in everyone's faces daily from Facebook to ads during mobile games, videos, even television if tobacco product is banned from advertising on tele and alcohol before the water shed why isn't gambling
attributes.background: Along side alcohol and drugs the next biggest addiction is gambling it ruins lives and leads to false hope letting only the bookies or casino get richer as your chasing that big win
